title: SOME PROBLEMS I ENCOUNTERED ON PIXEL 4a
content:
HI! does your pixel 4a (not 5g) have THESE issues, too? 

1) white flashes while watching netflix 
2) while i'm on the phone (scrolling, etc.) it locks on its own 
3) while watching netflix, it switches to facebook stories menu (the part where you select from your gallery) 
4) sometimes icons on the corners cannot be selected, it is like it looses its touchscreen 
5) keyboard slows down 

nwe, i'm still happy w/ the phone but just keep having this weird issues. 
(got the phone since last week of SEP2020)
